ComicInfo.Title: Pale Shelter
ComicInfo.Summary:
After rescuing Avina from a vicious retrieval mission by the Overseers, Syd Kiowa finally discovers why the off-worlder is such a valuable asset. Meanwhile, Keres, the Overseers' chief architect, dispatches the most ruthless death squad on the planet, The 88s. Their mission? Find Avina to complete the experiments and eliminate Syd Kiowa for good.
Note: The digital edition (10/16/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
